definitions.definition: A blemish or smear , especially a dark or sooty one.
examples: There was a smudge on the paper.

definitions.definition: Dense smoke , such as that used for fumigation .
A heap of damp combustibles partially ignited and burning slowly, placed on the windward side of a house, tent, etc. to keep off mosquitoes or other insects .
A quantity of herbs used in suffumigation .
labels: especially in the phrase "smudge stick" = "stick of incense"
definitions.label_groups: paganism , especially in the phrase "smudge stick" = "stick of incense"

main_definition: A blemish or smear , especially a dark or sooty one.
secondary_definitions: Dense smoke , such as that used for fumigation .
( US ) A heap of damp combustibles partially ignited and burning slowly, placed on the windward side of a house, tent, etc. to keep off mosquitoes or other insects .
( paganism , especially in the phrase "smudge stick" = "stick of incense" ) A quantity of herbs used in suffumigation .
